K01vinv03_u:469: evaṃrūpam api codakam ājñapayitvā saṃjñapayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ / (GBM 6.727.5-6; MSV IV 126.1-2).
K01vinv03_u:471: sacec codakaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavati vācā ca,
K01vinv03_u:475: na sūtrakuśalo na vinayakuśalaḥ na mātṛkākuśalaḥ,
K01vinv03_u:476: evaṃrūpam api codakam ājñapayitvā saṃjñapayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ / (GBM 6.727.6-7; MSV IV 126.2-6).
K01vinv03_u:478: sacec codakaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavati vācā ca,
K01vinv03_u:483: kiṃ tu saṃcintya saṃghamadhye adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati dharmaṃ cādharmataḥ,
K01vinv03_u:485: evaṃrūpam api codakam ājñapayitvā saṃjñapayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ / (GBM 6.727.7-8; MSV IV 126.7-12).
K01vinv03_u:488: sacec codakaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavati yāvat* sacen na saṃcintya saṃghamadhye adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati dharmaṃ cādharmataḥ,
K01vinv03_u:490: evaṃrūpam api codakam ājñapayitvā saṃjñapayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ. (GBM 6.727.8-9; MSV IV 126.13-16).
K01vinv03_u:492: sacec codakaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavati vācā ca,
K01vinv03_u:497: na saṃcintya saṃghamadhye adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati dharmaṃ cādharmataḥ,
K01vinv03_u:498: avinayaṃ vinayato dīpayati vinayaṃ cāvinayataḥ. sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ. (GBM 6.727.9-728.1; MSV IV 126.17-21).
K01vinv03_u:500: vadāyuṣmaṃ. codakena vadasi pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanīyayā duṣkṛtayā,
K01vinv03_u:502: gacchatas tiṣṭhato niṣaṇṇasya nipannasya. (GBM 6.728.1-2; MSV IV 126.21-127.2).
K01vinv03_u:505: na saṃghāvaśeṣayā na pāyantikayā na pratideśanīyayā na duṣkṛtayā,
K01vinv03_u:507: na pārājikayā na pāyantikayā na pratideśanīyayā na duṣkṛtayā,
K01vinv03_u:509: na pārājikayā na saṃghāvaśeṣayā na pratideśanīyayā na duṣkṛtayā. sacet pratideśanīyayā,
K01vinv03_u:510: na pārājikayā na saṃghāvaśeṣayā na pāyantikayā na duṣkṛtayā. saced duṣkṛtayā,
K01vinv03_u:511: na pārājikayā na saṃghāvaśeṣayā na pāyantikayā na pratideśanīyayā. (GBM 6.728.2-3; MSV IV 127.2-9).
K01vinv03_u:515: na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā na caturthikayā,
K01vinv03_u:516: saced dvitīyayā na prathamayā na tṛtīyayā na caturthikayā,
K01vinv03_u:517: sacet tṛtīyayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā na caturthikayā,
K01vinv03_u:518: sacec caturthikayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā. (GBM 6.728.4; MSV IV 127.10-14).
K01vinv03_u:520: sacet prathamayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā na dvitīyayā na yāvat trayodaśamikayā :
K01vinv03_u:521: saced yāvat trayodaśamikayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā yāvan na dvādaśamikayā. (GBM 6.728.4-5; MSV IV 127.14-16).
K01vinv03_u:525: sacen navatimayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā yāvan naikonanavatimayā / (GBM 6.728.5-6; MSV IV 127.16-18).
K01vinv03_u:527: sacet prathamayā pratideśanīyayā na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā na caturthikayā /
K01vinv03_u:528: saced dvitīyayā na prathamayā na tṛtīyayā na caturthikayā,
K01vinv03_u:529: sacet tṛtīyayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā na caturthikayā :
K01vinv03_u:530: sacec caturthikayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā / (GBM 6.728.6; MSV IV 127.18-128.1).
K01vinv03_u:532: sacet prathamayā duṣkṛtayā na dvitīyayā na tṛtīyayā na yāvad antimayā /
K01vinv03_u:533: saced antimayā na prathamayā na dvitīyayā yāvan nopāntimayā. (GBM 6.728.6-7; MSV IV 128.1-3).
K01vinv03_u:540: gacchataḥ na tiṣṭhataḥ na niṣaṇṇasya na nipannasya,
K01vinv03_u:541: sacet tiṣṭhataḥ na gacchataḥ na niṣaṇṇasya na nipannasya,
K01vinv03_u:542: sacen niṣaṇṇasya na gacchato na tiṣṭhato na nipannasya,
K01vinv03_u:543: sacen nipannasya na gacchataḥ na tiṣṭhataḥ na niṣaṇṇasya. (GBM 6.728.7-8; MSV IV 128.4-9).
K01vinv03_u:545: sacec codakaḥ evaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśāsyamānaḥ samanugāhyamānaḥ sthānāsthānaṃ saṃkrāmati,
K01vinv03_u:546: acodakaḥ syāt*. acoditas syāt*. sacec codakaḥ sthānāsthānaṃ na saṃkrāmati,
K01vinv03_u:549: sacec codakaḥ sthānāsthānaṃ na saṃkrāmati codita idaṃ syād vacanīyaṃ. vadāyuṣmaṃ. ke te tasmiṃ samaye kāyasaṃskārā vāksaṃskārā manaḥsaṃskārā. (GBM 6.728.9-10; MSV IV 128.13-15).
K01vinv03_u:566: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ naivāsikā bhikṣavaḥ sanniṣaṇṇā bhavanti
K01vinv03_u:567: sannipatitāḥ paṃca vā uttare vā. teṣām evaṃ bhavati. santi bhikṣavo ye 'nāgatakā
K01vinv03_u:568: iti. ye 'nāgatakāḥ kalpaty asmākaṃ tair vinā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā pravārayituṃ,
K01vinv03_u:569: te kalpārthinaḥ kalpaniṣkārā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā pravārayanti. (GBM 6.729.1-2; MSV IV 128.21-129.3).
K01vinv03_u:571: tataḥ paścān naivāsikā bhikṣavaḥ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitā āgacchaṃty alpatarakās.
K01vinv03_u:572: taiḥ punar api jñaptiṃ kṛtvā pravārayitavyaṃ. pūrvikā bhikṣavaḥ sātisārāḥ kalpasāmantakāḥ.
K01vinv03_u:575: pūrvavad yāvad yathā poṣadhavastuny evaṃ yathoktā uddānagāthā vācyaṃ. ekas tu viśeṣaḥ. tatra naivāsikā bhikṣavaḥ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ catvāro vā uttare vā,
K01vinv03_u:576: ihāpi vācyaṃ paṃca vā uttare veti : // // (GBM 6.729.3; MSV IV 129.5-8).
K01vinv03_u:581: glānakaś ca vastu ca vargo bhavati yaḥ samudditaḥ // //
K01vinv03_u:585: yathāpi tad bhadaṃta varṣopagatā bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇvanti. bhikṣavaḥ āgacchanti kalahakārakā
K01vinv03_u:586: bhaṇḍanakārakā vigrahakārakā vivādakārakā ādhikaraṇikāḥ. te 'smākaṃ codayiṣyaṃti
K01vinv03_u:587: smārayiṣyaṃti alajjitāyo vaitarikatvena. tais teṣāṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ. tair upāliṃ
K01vinv03_u:588: bhikṣubhir dve trīṇi vā poṣadhakarmāṇy atikramya pravārayitavyaṃ. (GBM 6.729.4-5; MSV IV 129.12-17).
K01vinv03_u:591: sacet saṃpadyate 'ty evaṃ kuśalaṃ. no cet saṃpadyate,
K01vinv03_u:592: tair bhikṣubhir dvau trayo vā āpadarthikā maṇḍalakāḥ saṃmantavyāḥ. (GBM 6.729.5-6; MSV IV 129.17-19).
K01vinv03_u:594: sacet saṃpadyate 'ty evaṃ kuśalaṃ. no cet saṃpadyate,
K01vinv03_u:595: vāksākhilyakena pratyudgamya pātracīvaraṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ. pātracīvareṇāmohayitvā pramohayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ. (GBM 6.729.6; MSV IV 129.19-130.1).
K01vinv03_u:599: sacet saṃpadyate 'ty evaṃ kuśalaṃ. no cet saṃpadyate,
K01vinv03_u:600: dharmaśravaṇaṃ dātavyam*. dharmaśravaṇenāmohayitvā pramohayitvā pravārayitavyaṃ. (GBM 6.729.6-7; MSV IV 130.1-3).
K01vinv03_u:602: sacet saṃpadyate 'ty evaṃ kuśalaṃ. no cet saṃpadyate,
K01vinv03_u:603: tair upāliṃ bhikṣubhir maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā poṣadhaḥ kartavyaḥ. (GBM 6.729.7; MSV IV 130.3-5).
K01vinv03_u:605: sacet ta evaṃ vadeyuḥ. adyāyuṣmantas saṃghasya pravāraṇā pāṃcadaśikā. kasmād yūyaṃ
K01vinv03_u:606: poṣadhaṃ kurutheti. ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ. āgantukā yūyam āyuṣmanto. naivāsikā bhikṣavo
K01vinv03_u:609: tataḥ paścāt tair gatavegair gatapratyarthibhiḥ punar api pravārayitavyaṃ : // (GBM 6.729.7-9; MSV IV 130.5-10).
K01vinv03_u:611: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ paṃcadaśyāṃ glānaḥ aglānasya pravāraṇāṃ sthāpayati.
K01vinv03_u:612: glāna idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ. āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ. glānas tvam aprayogakṣamaḥ. (GBM
K01vinv03_u:615: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ aglānaḥ glānasya pravāraṇāṃ (Pravā-v 174)
K01vinv03_u:616: sthāpayati. aglāna idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ. āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ. glāno 'sāv aprayogakṣamaḥ. (GBM 6.729.9-10; MSV IV 130.13-15).
K01vinv03_u:618: yathāpi tat tad eva pravāraṇāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ glānaḥ glānasya dūtena pravāraṇāṃ sthāpayati.
K01vinv03_u:619: dūta idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ. āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ. glāno 'sāv aprayogakṣamaḥ. (GBM 6.729.10; MSV IV 130.16-18).
K01vinv03_u:622: pañcadaśyām aglāno glānasya pravāraṇāṃ dūtena sthāpayati. dūta idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ. āgamaya tvam āyuṣman. glāno 'sāv aprayogakṣamaḥ. (GBM 6.729.10; MSV IV 130.18).
K01vinv03_u:624: therefore the Sanskrit text of Pravā-v 14.1 to 14.2.4 is not extant.
